channel.title: Authors on Ravel Antunes
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Ravel Antunes

item.title: Ravel Antunes
item.description: With a career spanning startups, Fortune 100 leadership roles, and patents, I’ve built and invested in ventures across diverse sectors—from logistics and entertainment to healthcare and hospitality. My work often centers on innovation, especially in cloud computing, AI, and robotics, and I’m passionate about the ways technology can reshape industries. Each experience has offered new perspectives, fueling my interest in transformative solutions and the future of tech.
